ttp_template:
<group name="ip_mask_disabled_interface_network">
add address={{IP | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}}/{{MASK}} disabled={{DISABLED}} interface={{INTERFACE}} network={{NETWORK | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="ip_mask_comment_disabled_interface_network">
add address={{IP | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}}/{{MASK}} comment="{{COMMENT | ORPHRASE}}" disabled={{DISABLED}} interface={{INTERFACE}} network={{NETWORK | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
# jul/21/2023 09:42:42 by RouterOS 6.48.6
# software id = 1234-ABCD
#
# model = RB750UPr2
# serial number = AB12345CD789
/ip address
add address=10.159.1.159/30 disabled=no interface=ether2 network=10.159.1.158
add address=10.80.90.5/27 comment="test comment" disabled=yes interface=eth3_vlan1 network=10.80.90.0
textfsm_template:
Value IP (\S+)
Value MASK (\d+)
Value COMMENT (.*?)
Value DISABLED (yes|no)
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value NETWORK (\S+)

Start
  ^\s*#.*$$
  ^/ip\s+address\s*$$
  ^\s*add\s+address=${IP}/${MASK}(?:\s+comment="${COMMENT}")?\s+disabled=${DISABLED}\s+interface=${INTERFACE}\s+network=${NETWORK}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^\s*$$
  ^. -> Error
